title: Spec Ops: The Line +DLC RePack By R.G Mechanics NASWARI+ZOHAIB

Year of release : 2012
Genre : Action (Shooter) / 3D / 3rd Person

System requirements:

Memory : 1.5 GB Windows XP / 2 GB Windows Vista / 7
Video : Video card with 256 MB NVIDIA GeForce 7900 GS, ATI Radeon HD 2400XT or a similar, compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0, which supports 32-bit color and pixel shaders
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX
Free space on hard disk : 9 GB

Description :
Spec Ops: The Line - an unusual cinematic third-person shooter that will make you enter into a confrontation not only with real opponents, but even with their own principles. Get ready to be in a world where there is no place the concept of "morality" and at every step we have to choose - who will live and who will die. Dubai was wiped off the face of the Earth horrific cataclysm. The unprecedented dust storm turned the once magnificent city in ruins. And now you in the role of Delta Force squad captain Martin Walker have to go to the hostile territory to find and return the home of Colonel John Konrad. Take part in the raid and battle against opponents who are not afraid of death. To survive and succeed, it is necessary to use a variety of tactics of warfare, a variety of authentic military vehicles and landscape features. Unique Dynamic Sand and you will become a reliable ally and a treacherous enemy. Sand does not care who is right and who is wrong - a lucky shot could bring down the weight of silicon on the heads of your enemies, but the same can happen to you.
Spec Ops: The Line combines an exciting storyline campaign and addictive multiplayer with multiple competitive and cooperative modes. You will be able to enter the conflict on the side of one of the two factions and to prove their superiority against the background of the beautiful and terrifying at the same time the ruined landscape of Dubai.
